维果茨基在世时，他和卢里亚发起了多项研究，旨在探讨社会迅速变革对认知的影响，以及学校教育的具体影响。10除了 对无文盲人群的认知发展感兴趣之外，他的关注点还涵盖了十月革命带来的社会和教育变革的其他方面。这些问题占据了许多当代正在经历快速现代化和城市化的国家的教育家。即使在公共教育概念已有两个世纪历史的美国，也会出现类似的问题，因为大量人群尚未融入或受益于大众教育。维果茨基关注的一些问题至今仍然存在，包括公共教育的长度和范围、使用标准化测试来评估儿童的教育潜力，以及有效的教学和课程模式。

In Vygotsky’s lifetime he and Luria initiated studies aimed at examining the cognitive consequences of rapid social change and the specific impact of schooling.10 In addition to his interest in cognitive development among nonliterate peoples, his concern encompassed other aspects of the social and educational transformations brought about by the October Revolution. These concerns occupy many contemporary educators in countries undergoing rapid modernization and urbanization. Even in the United States, where the concept of public education is two centuries old, similar issues arise because large groups of people have not yet been integrated into or benefited from mass education. Some of the issues of concern to Vygotsky that are still alive today are the length and scope of public education, the use of standardized tests to assess the educational potential of children, and effective models of teaching and curriculum.

维果茨基在 20 世纪 30 年代激烈的教育辩论中提出了“近侧发展区”的概念，他从教学的角度概括了他的认知理论的核心原则：人际（社会）过程向个人内部过程的转变；内化阶段；有经验的学习者的作用。他写道，近侧发展区是“[儿童]通过独立解决问题确定的实际发展水平与在成人指导下或与更有能力的同龄人合作解决问题确定的潜在发展水平之间的差距”（第 6 章 ）。

Through the concept of the zone of proximal development as advanced by Vygotsky during intense educational debates in the 1930s, he telescopes, from the point of view of instruction, central tenets of his cognitive theory: the transformation of an interpersonal (social) process to an intrapersonal one; the stages of internalization; and the role of experienced learners. The zone of proximal development, he wrote, is “the distance between the [child’s] actual developmental level as determined by independent problem solving and the level of potential development as determined through problem solving under adult guidance or in collaboration with more capable peers” (chapter 6 ).

许多教育工作者认识到，学习速度可能因人而异，因此通过使用程序化和经常机械化的教学，将特别“学习迟缓”的学生与老师和同龄人隔离开来。相反，维果茨基认为学习是一个深刻的社会过程，因此强调对话以及语言在教学和中介认知发展中所起的各种作用。仅仅通过口头讲课让学生接触新材料既不能让成人指导，也不能让学生与同龄人合作。为了在教学中实施近侧发展区的概念，心理学家和教育工作者必须合作分析由教学激发并需要后续学习的内部（“地下”）发展过程。因此，在这个理论中，教学代表了促进发展的手段；也就是说，根据学习者的“实际发展水平”，在他们身上唤起人类知识的社会详尽内容及其内化所必需的认知策略。维果茨基批评教育干预落后于已发展的心理过程，而不是关注新兴的功能和能力。保罗·弗莱雷在第三世界国家开展的扫盲运动是这些原则的一个特别富有想象力的应用。由于他根据学生所处的特定历史和文化环境调整教育方法，他们能够将他们的“自发”概念（基于社会实践的概念）与教师在教学环境中引入的概念结合起来。11

Many educators, recognizing that the rate of learning may vary from child to child, isolate particularly “slow learners” from their teachers as well as their peers through the use of programmed and frequently mechanized instruction. In contrast, Vygotsky, because he views learning as a profoundly social process, emphasizes dialogue and the varied roles that language plays in instruction and in mediated cognitive growth. The mere exposure of students to new materials through oral lectures neither allows for adult guidance nor for collaboration with peers. To implement the concept of the zone of proximal development in instruction, psychologists and educators must collaborate in the analysis of the internal (“subterranean”) developmental processes which are stimulated by teaching and which are needed for subsequent learning. In this theory, then, teaching represents the means through which development is advanced; that is, the socially elaborated contents of human knowledge and the cognitive strategies necessary for their internalization are evoked in the learners according to their “actual developmental levels.” Vygotsky criticizes educational intervention that lags behind developed psychological processes instead of focusing upon emerging functions and capabilities. A particularly imaginative application of these principles are Paolo Freire’s literacy campaigns in Third World countries. Because he adapted his educational methods to the specific historical and cultural setting in which his students lived, they were able to combine their “spontaneous” concepts (those based on social practice) with those introduced by teachers in instructional settings.11

维果茨基的历史文化方法

VYGOTSKY’S HISTORICAL-CULTURAL APPROACH

维果茨基著作中最突出的主题或许是他强调了我们人类的独特品质，即作为人类，我们如何在不同的文化和历史背景下积极地认识和改变自己。维果茨基在这本书中反复区分 动物的适应能力与人类的适应能力不同。这种区别的关键因素在于，人类生活具有历史创造和文化阐述的维度，而动物的社会组织则缺乏这些维度。在高级功能的发展中——即在认知过程的内化中——人类社会存在的细节反映在人类认知中：个体有能力将自己对共同经历的理解外化并与其社会群体的其他成员分享。

Perhaps the most distinguishing theme of Vygotsky’s writings is his emphasis on the unique qualities of our species, how as human beings we actively realize and change ourselves in the varied contexts of culture and history. Repeatedly in this volume Vygotsky differentiates the adaptive capabilities of animals from those of humans. The critical factor on which this distinction is based is the historically created and culturally elaborated dimensions of human life that are absent from the social organization of animals. In the development of higher functions—that is, in the internalization of the processes of knowing—the particulars of human social existence are reflected in human cognition: an individual has the capacity to externalize and share with other members of her social group her understanding of their shared experience.

与其他物种相比，人类婴儿相对不成熟，因此需要长期依赖成年人的照顾，这种情况给婴儿带来了一个基本的心理矛盾：一方面，他完全依赖于比他更有经验的生物，另一方面，他从社会发展和最佳的学习环境中获益。尽管儿童依赖于长期的养育和照顾，但他们在家庭和社区的支持环境中积极参与自己的学习。正如爱德华·E·伯格指出的那样：

The relative immaturity of the human infant, in contrast with other species, necessitates a lengthy reliance on caretaking adults, a circumstance that creates a basic psychological contradiction for the infant: on the one hand he is totally dependent on organisms vastly more experienced than himself, and on the other hand he reaps the benefits of a socially developed and optimal setting for learning. Although children are dependent on lengthy nurturance and caretaking, they are active participants in their own learning within the supportive contexts of family and community. As Edward E. Berg pointed out:

正如劳动工具随着历史而变化一样，思维工具也随着历史而变化。正如新的劳动工具产生新的社会结构一样，新的思维工具也产生新的心理结构。传统上，人们认为家庭和国家等事物或多或少一直以它们现在的形式存在。同样，人们也倾向于将心理结构视为普遍和永恒的东西。然而，对维果茨基来说，社会结构和心理结构都有非常明确的历史根源，并且是某些工具发展水平的非常具体的产物。12

Just as the tools of labor change historically, so the tools of thinking change historically. And just as new tools of labor give rise to new social structures, new tools of thinking give rise to new mental structures. Traditionally, it was thought that such things as the family and the state always existed in more or less their present form. Likewise, one also tends to view the structure of the mind as something universal and eternal. To Vygotsky, however, both social structures and mental structures turn out to have very definite historical roots, and are quite specific products of certain levels of tool development.12

维果茨基对人类发展的研究深受恩格斯的影响，恩格斯强调劳动和工具在改变人类与环境的关系方面发挥着关键作用。恩格斯这样描述工具在人类发展中的作用：“工具具体象征着人的活动，人对自然的改造：生产。” 13 这种方法需要理解历史在人类心理发展中的积极作用。在《自然辩证法》中 ，恩格斯提出了一些关键概念，这些概念被维果茨基进一步阐述。他们都批评了那些认为“只有自然影响人类，只有自然条件决定人类的历史发展”的心理学家和哲学家，并强调在历史进程中，人类也会“影响自然，改变自然，为自己创造新的自然生存条件”。14此外 ，维果茨基认为，工具的影响 使用对人类至关重要，不仅因为它可以帮助人类更有效地与外部环境建立联系，还因为工具的使用对人类大脑的内部和功能关系产生了重要影响。

Vygotsky’s study of human development was deeply influenced by Friedrich Engels, who stressed the critical role of labor and tools in transforming the relation between human beings and their environment. The role of tools in human development was described by Engels as follows: “The tool specifically symbolizes human activity, man’s transformation of nature: production.”13 Such an approach requires an understanding of the active role of history in human psychological development. In The Dialectics of Nature Engels presented some key concepts that were elaborated by Vygotsky. They both criticized psychologists and philosophers who held the view “that only nature affects man and only natural conditions determine man’s historic development,” and emphasized that in the course of history man, too, “affects nature, changes it, creates for himself new natural conditions of existence.”14 Furthermore, Vygotsky argued that the effect of tool use upon humans is fundamental not only because it has helped them relate more effectively to their external environment but also because tool use has had important effects upon internal and functional relationships within the human brain.

虽然恩格斯和维果茨基的理论是基于他们写作年代所掌握的有限的考古学发现，但当代考古学家和体质人类学家，如利基和舍伍德·沃什伯恩，对较新的发现的解释与恩格斯和维果茨基的观点一致。沃什伯恩说：“最简单工具的成功开启了整个人类进化趋势，并导致了当今文明。”维果茨基很可能同意沃什伯恩的观点，沃什伯恩认为人类从灵长类祖先进化而来，形成了“聪明、具有探索精神、好玩和精力充沛的灵长类动物……并且工具、狩猎、火、复杂的社会语言、人类方式和大脑共同进化产生了古人。” 15 这些考古发现支持了维果茨基关于人类的概念。

Although Engels and Vygotsky based their theories on the limited archaeological findings available to them during the years in which they wrote, contemporary archaeologists and physical anthropologists such as the Leakeys and Sherwood Washburn have interpreted more recent findings in a manner consistent with Engels’ and Vygotsky’s point of view. Washburn states, “It was the success of the simplest tools that started the whole trend of human evolution and led to the civilization of today.” Most likely Vygotsky would have agreed with Washburn, who views the evolution of human life from our primate ancestors as resulting in “intelligent, exploratory, playful, and vigorous primates . . . and that tools, hunting, fire, complex social speech, the human way and the brain evolved together to produce ancient man.”15 These archaeological discoveries support Vygotsky’s concepts of what it is to be human.

维果茨基的作品——就像世界各地的伟大理论家一样——既具有普遍性，又具有特殊性。认知心理学家和教育家都对探索他的思想在当今的含义感兴趣，无论是关于游戏、科学概念的起源，还是关于语言和思想的关系。四十年前，他的学生仍然以当代人的热情和活力争论着他的思想——我们这些担任他编辑的人发现，对他的作品有许多可能的、有时相互矛盾的解释。但维果茨基的多样而令人振奋的作品之间有着一条强有力的线索：那就是他的思维方式。在这个日益破坏性和疏远的世界中，他的遗产是通过他的理论表述为重建人类生活以求生存提供了强有力的工具。16

The impact of Vygotsky’s work—as that of great theoreticians everywhere—is both general and specific. Cognitive psychologists as well as educators are interested in exploring the present-day implications of his notions, whether they refer to play, to the genesis of scientific concepts, or to the relation of language and thought. The men and women who were his students forty years ago still debate his ideas with the intensity and vigor due a contemporary—and we who worked as his editors found many possible, sometimes contradictory, interpretations of his work. But there is a powerful thread drawing together Vygotsky’s diverse and stimulating writings: it is the way in which his mind worked. His legacy in an increasingly destructive and alienating world is to offer through his theoretical formulations a powerful tool for restructuring human life with an aim toward survival.16

笔记

Notes

7. K. Buhler，《心理发展 》，第 49-51 页。另请参阅 C. Buhler，《第一年 》。黑猩猩的语言能力目前是心理学家和语言学家争论的话题。显然，黑猩猩能够发出比 Buhler 和 Vygotsky 撰写这些段落时预期的更复杂的手势。然而，这些观察结果所证实的关于认知和语言能力的推论仍然存在激烈的争论。

7. K. Buhler, Mental Development , pp. 49–51. See also C. Buhler, First Year . The linguistic capabilities of chimpanzees are currently the subject of controversy among psychologists and linguists. It seems clear that chimpanzees are capable of more complex signing than expected at the time Buhler and Vygotsky wrote these passages. However, the inferences about cognitive and linguistic competence warranted by these observations are still hotly debated.

8. SA Shapiro 和 ED Gerke，M. Ya 中描述。巴索夫，普通土壤学基础 （莫斯科-列宁格勒：Gosizdat.，1928）。

9. P. Guillaume 和 I. Meyerson，“Recherches sur l'usage de l'instrument chez les singes”，《心理学杂志》 ，27 (1930)：177–236。

9. P. Guillaume and I. Meyerson, “Recherches sur l’usage de l’instrument chez les singes,” Journal de Psychologie , 27 (1930): 177–236.

10. 维果茨基在世时才刚刚开始对失语症进行研究。这一结论的错误性以及他关于失语症的理论的后续变化可以在 AR Luria 的著作中找到；参见《创伤性失语症》 （海牙：Mouton，1970 年）。

10. Research on aphasia was barely begun by Vygotsky during his own lifetime. The error of this conclusion and subsequent changes in his theory regarding aphasia may be found in the work of A. R. Luria; see Traumatic Aphasia (The Hague: Mouton, 1970).

11. W. Stern，《儿童早期至六岁心理学》 （纽约：Holt，Rinehart and Winston，1924 年；俄文版，彼得格勒，1915 年）。

12. J. Piaget, The Language and Thought of the Child (New York: Meridian Books, 1955; also International Library of Psychology, 1925). The differences between Vygotsky’s and Piaget’s views of early language development and the role of egocentric speech is treated extensively in chapter 3 of Vygotsky’s Thought and Language (Cambridge: MIT Press, 1962) and in Piaget’s volume of essays, Six Psychological Studies (New York: Random House, 1967).

13. 参见 RE Levina，关于 LS Vygotsky 关于儿童言语计划作用的观点，Voprosi Psikhologii， 14（1938）：105-115。尽管 Levina 在 20 世纪 20 年代末提出了这些观察，但除了这个简短的解释外，这些观察尚未发表。

13. See R. E. Levina, for L. S. Vygotsky’s ideas on the planning role of speech in children, Voprosi Psikhologii, 14 (1938): 105–115. Although Levina made these observations in the late 1920s, they remain unpublished except for this brief explication.

14. 皮亚杰，《语言和思想》 ，第110页。

10. N. Ach Über die Willenstatigkeit und das Denken (1905)。

10. N. Ach Über die Willenstatigkeit und das Denken (1905).

11. 有关这些思想在学龄前儿童自愿记忆发展中的杰出应用，请参阅伊斯托米娜在《苏联心理学》 第 12 卷第 4 期（1975 年）：5-64 上的文章。

11. For an outstanding application of these ideas to the development of voluntary memory in preschool age children, see the article by Istomina in Soviet Psychology , 12, no. 4 (1975): 5–64.

第六章

CHAPTER 6

1. 皮亚杰，《语言与思想》 。

1. Piaget, Language and Thought .

2. William James, Talks to Teachers (New York: Norton, 1958), pp. 36–37.

5. Dorothea McCarthy，《学龄前儿童的语言发展》 （明尼阿波利斯：明尼苏达大学出版社，1930 年）。

后记

AFTERWORD

1. 请参阅 Nan Elsasser 和 Vera John-Steiner，《互动主义的读写能力提升方法》，《哈佛教育评论》 ，第 47 卷，第 3 期（1977 年 8 月）：第 355-370 页。

1. See Nan Elsasser and Vera John-Steiner, “An Interactionist Approach to Advancing Literacy,” Harvard Educational Review , 47, no. 3 (August 1977): 355–370.

2. 本文未收录《工具与符号》和《高级心理功能的发展》 一书的译文。维果茨基广泛使用了“自然”一词；见上文第 38-39 页。

2. Translation of passage from “Tool and Symbol” and Development of Higher Psychological Functions not included in this text. Vygotsky used the term “natural” widely; see pp. 38–39, above.

3. 在本书中，编辑们将维果茨基对行为“自然”方面的使用解释为生物学上固有的特征，例如出生时就存在的反射。从 AN Leontiev、AR Luria 和 BM Teplov 为维果茨基的《高级心理功能发展》所写的序言中的以下段落中，可以得到对“自然”的另一种解释 。

3. In this volume, the editors have interpreted Vygotsky’s use of “natural” aspects of behavior to mean biologically given features, such as reflexes present at birth. An additional interpretation of “natural” can be gained from the following passage taken from A. N. Leontiev’s, A. R. Luria’s, and B. M. Teplov’s preface to Vygotsky’s Development of Higher Psychological Functions .

他试图表明，不可能将人类高级心理功能的形成归结为其基本形式的发展过程，这导致了在遗传层面和共存层面上对更高发展水平的错误划分。因此，例如，记忆发展被描述为经历两个阶段：纯自然记忆阶段，终止于学龄前，随后是更高级的中介记忆发展阶段。共存记忆形式的发展也以同样的方式处理。一种形式完全建立在生物基础上，其他形式则是儿童社会和文化发展的产物。这种对立出现在 LS Vygotsky 的著作和他的合作者的研究中，当时受到了合理的批评。它确实没有根据：毕竟，即使是在非常年幼的孩子中，心理过程也是在与成人的言语互动的影响下形成的，因此不是“自然的”。幼儿的记忆过程不是“自然的”，因为它们已经因语言习得而发生了变化。对于保存清晰可辨的“自然”图像记忆的情况，我们也可以说同样的话，这种记忆在人类身上会发生转变。

His attempt to show that it was impossible to reduce the formation of man’s higher mental functions to the process of the development of their elementary forms leads to the false division at the genetic plane and at the plane of coexistence at higher levels of development. Thus, for example, memory development is presented as going through two stages: the stage of purely natural memory which terminates at a preschool age and the following stage of development of a higher, mediated memory. The development of co-existing forms of memory is treated in the same way. One form rests exclusively on biological foundations, and others are the product of the child’s social and cultural development. This opposition which appears in L. S. Vygotsky’s writings and in the research of his collaborators justifiably was criticized in its time. It is truly without foundation: after all, even in very young children psychological processes are formed under the influence of verbal interaction with adults and consequently are not “natural.” The young child’s memory processes are not “natural” because they already have changed as a result of language acquisition. We can say the same with regard to cases of the preservation of a sharply distinguished “natural” eidetic memory which turns out to be subject to transformation in man.

在指出维果茨基对自然（有机）形式和更高级（文化）形式的心理过程的错误对比的不足之处的同时，我们必须强调，这种对比绝不是从他的一般理论立场中推断出来的。

While pointing out the inadequacy of Vygotsky’s false contrast between natural (organic) and higher (cultural) forms of mental processes, we must emphasize that this contrast in no way is implied from his general theoretical position.

尽管维果茨基因提出这种自然与文化之间的人为二元性而受到批评，但正如列昂季耶夫和卢里亚指出的那样，这种区别实际上是一种抽象，是一种描述非常复杂过程的手段。“儿童的心理发展是一个持续的过程，即从最初被动的心理功能中获得主动控制。为了获得这种控制，儿童学会使用符号，从而将这些‘自然’的心理功能转化为符号介导的文化功能。”爱德华·E·伯格，《LS·维果茨基的意识社会和历史起源理论》（博士论文，威斯康星大学，1970 年），第 164 页。

Although Vygotsky has been criticized for posing this artificial duality between the natural and the cultural, as Leontiev and Luria point out, the distinction is in fact an abstraction, a vehicle for describing a very complex process. “The child’s mental development is a continuous process of gaining active control over initially passive mental functions. To gain this control the child learns to use signs and thus converts these ‘natural’ mental functions into sign-mediated, cultural functions.” Edward E. Berg, “L. S. Vygotsky’s Theory of the Social and Historical Origins of Consciousness” (Ph.D. Diss., University of Wisconsin, 1970), p. 164.

4. 本文摘自《工具与符号》的未校对译文。

4. This passage is from the unedited translation of “Tool and Symbol.”

5. Herbert G. Birch 和 Joan Dye Gussow，《弱势儿童：健康、营养和学业失败》 （纽约：Harcourt, Brace and World，1970 年），第 7 页。

5. Herbert G. Birch and Joan Dye Gussow, Disadvantaged Children: Health, Nutrition and School Failure (New York: Harcourt, Brace and World, 1970), p. 7.

6. AR Luria，《LS Vygotsky 和功能定位问题》，《苏联心理学》 ，5，第 3 期（1967 年）：53-57。

6. A. R. Luria, “L. S. Vygotsky and the Problem of Functional Localization,” Soviet Psychology , 5, no. 3 (1967): 53–57.

7. E. Berg，《维果茨基的理论》，第46页。

7. E. Berg, “Vygotsky’s Theory,” p. 46.

8. 《高级心理功能的发展》 段落的翻译 未包含在正文中。

8. Translation of passage from Development of Higher Psychological Functions not included in text.

9. AN Leontiev 和 AR Luria，《LS Vygotskii 的心理学思想》，载 BB Wolman 主编，《当代心理学的历史根源》 （纽约：Harper and Row，1968 年），第 338-367 页。

9. A. N. Leontiev and A. R. Luria, “The Psychological Ideas of L. S. Vygotskii,” in B. B. Wolman, ed., Historical Roots of Contemporary Psychology (New York: Harper and Row, 1968), pp. 338–367.

10. AR Luria，《认知发展：其文化和社会基础》 （剑桥：哈佛大学出版社，1976 年）。

10. A. R. Luria, Cognitive Development: Its Cultural and Social Foundations (Cambridge: Harvard University Press, 1976).

11. P.弗莱雷，《被压迫者教育学》 （纽约：Seabury，1970 年）。

11. P. Freire, Pedagogy of the Oppressed (New York: Seabury, 1970).

12. “维果茨基的理论”，第45-46页。

12. “Vygotsky’s Theory,” pp. 45–46.

⑬ 马克思和恩格斯，《选集》 （莫斯科：1953年），第63页。

13. K. Marx and F. Engels, Selected Works (Moscow: 1953), p. 63.

14 恩格斯：《自然辩证法》 （纽约：国际出版社，1940年），第172页。

14. Engels, Dialectics of Nature (New York: International Publishers, 1940), p. 172.

15. “工具与人类进化”，《科学美国人》 ，203卷第3期（1960年）：63-75。

15. “Tools and Human Evolution,” Scientific American , 203, no. 3 (1960): 63–75.

16. 我们要特别感谢斯坦·施泰纳 (Stan Steiner) 和里卡多·梅兹 (Ricardo Maez)，感谢他们在我们多年来编写本书期间给予的持续支持，以及他们对维果茨基的著作对我们共同未来的重要性的认可。

16. We would especially like to thank Stan Steiner and Ricardo Maez for their continued support through our many years of work on this volume and for their recognition of the importance of Vygotsky’s writings to our joint futures.

维果茨基的作品

1928

1928

“智障儿童发展中的补偿过程问题”。《列宁格勒辅助学校工作人员大会报告》，1931 年 5 月 23 日。LS Vygotsky 私人档案。速记，48 页。

“The Question of Compensatory Processes in the Development of the Retarded Child.” Report to the Conference of the Workers of Auxiliary Schools, Leningrad, May 23, 1931. Private archives of L. S. Vygotsky. Stenography, 48 pp.

“土壤学和相关科学问题”。《土壤学》 ，1931 年第 3 期，第 52-58 页。

“Problems of Pedology and Related Sciences.” Pedology , 1931, no. 3, pp. 52–58.

“集体因素是异常儿童发展的一个因素。” 《缺陷学问题》 ，1931 年，第 1-2 期，第 8-17 页；第 3 期，第 3-18 页。

“The Collective as a Factor of Development in the Abnormal Child.” In Problems of Defectology , 1931, nos. 1–2, pp. 8–17; no. 3, pp. 3–18.

“思考”。《苏联大百科全书》 ，1931 年，第 XIX 卷，第 414–426 栏。

“Thinking.” The Great Soviet Encyclopedia , 1931, vol. XIX, cols. 414–426.

青少年儿童学 。讲座 9-16。莫斯科-列宁格勒：莫斯科第二大学推广部，1931 年。

The Pedology of Teenagers . Lectures 9–16. Moscow-Leningrad: Extension Division of the Second Moscow State University, 1931.

“儿童发展中的实践活动和思维与政治技术主义问题的关系”。LS Vygotsky 私人档案。手稿，4 页。

“Practical Activity and Thinking in the Development of the Child in Connection with a Problem of Politechnism.” Private archives of L. S. Vygotsky. Manuscript, 4 pp.

《记忆的发展》序言 ，AN Leontiev 著。莫斯科-列宁格勒：Uchpedgiz，1931 年。

Foreword to Development of Memory by A. N. Leontiev. Moscow-Leningrad: Uchpedgiz, 1931.

YK Zvelfel 所著《聋哑儿童行为与教育论文集》序言。莫斯科-列宁格勒：Uchpedgiz，1931 年。

Foreword to Essay on the Behavior and Education of the Deaf-Mute Child by Y. K. Zvelfel. Moscow-Leningrad: Uchpedgiz, 1931.

《心理学词典》 。莫斯科。Uchpedgiz，1931 年。（与 BE Var-shava 合著。）

The Psychological Dictionary . Moscow. Uchpedgiz, 1931. (With B. E. Var-shava.)

“心理技术与教育学”。1930 年 11 月 21 日共产主义科学院会议报告。苏联教育科学院普通教育心理学研究所档案，第82 卷， 第 1 期，第 3 期，第 23-57 页。

“Psychotechnics and Pedology.” Report to the Meeting of the Communist Academy, Nov. 21, 1930. Archives of the Institute of General and Pedagogical Psychology, Academy of Pedagogical Sciences, USSR, fol. 82, vol. I, no. 3, pp. 23–57.

1932

1932

“演员的创造力问题”。PM Jakobson 著《演员舞台情感心理学》 ，第 197-211 页。莫斯科：政府出版社，1936 年。

“The Problem of Creativity in Actors.” In The Psychology of the Stage Feelings of an Actor by P. M. Jakobson, pp. 197–211. Moscow: Government Publishing House, 1936.

“走向精神分裂症心理学。” 《苏联神经病理学、精神病学和心理卫生学 》，第 1 卷（1932 年），第 8 期，第 352-361 页。

“Toward a Psychology of Schizophrenia.” Soviet Neuropathology, Psychiatry and Psychohygiene , vol. 1 (1932), no. 8, pp. 352–361.

“迈向精神分裂症心理学”。《当代精神分裂症问题》 ，第 19-28 页。莫斯科：Medgiz，1933 年。

“Toward a Psychology of Schizophrenia.” In Contemporary Problems of Schizophrenia , pp. 19–28. Moscow: Medgiz, 1933.

“Lectures on Psychology.” Leningrad Pedagogical Institute, March-April 1932. Archives of the Leningrad Pedagogical Institute. Stenography. Also in Development of Higher Psychological Functions , pp. 235–363. Moscow: Academy of Pedagogical Sciences, RSFSR, 1960.

“婴儿期”。LS Vygotsky 私人档案。手稿，78 页。

“Infancy.” Private archives of L. S. Vygotsky. Manuscript, 78 pp.

EK Gracheva 所著《智障儿童的教育与教学》序言 。莫斯科-列宁格勒：Uchpedgiz，1932 年。

Foreword to Education and Teaching of the Retarded Child by E. K. Gracheva. Moscow-Leningrad: Uchpedgiz, 1932.

AN Leontiev 所著《记忆的发展》序言 。莫斯科，1932 年。（与 AN Leontiev 合著。）

Foreword to Development of Memory by A. N. Leontiev. Moscow, 1932. (With A. N. Leontiev.)

“阿诺德·格塞尔研究中的儿童发展问题”。载于A.格塞尔著《教育与童年》 ，第 3-14 页。莫斯科-列宁格勒：Uchpedgiz，1932 年。

“The Problem of Development of the Child in the Research of Arnold Gesell.” In Education and Childhood by A. Gesell, pp. 3–14. Moscow-Leningrad: Uchpedgiz, 1932.

“皮亚杰学说中的儿童语言和思维问题”。J .皮亚杰著《儿童语言和思维》 第 3-54 页。莫斯科-列宁格勒：Uchpedgiz，1932 年。

“Problem of the Speech and Thinking of the Child in the Teachings of Piaget.” In Language and Thought of the Child by J. Piaget, pp. 3–54. Moscow-Leningrad: Uchpedgiz, 1932.

“幼儿教育”。讲座，列宁格勒教育学院，1932 年 12 月 15 日。列宁格勒教育学院档案。速记，50 页。

“Early Childhood.” Lecture, Leningrad Pedagogical Institute, Dec. 15, 1932. Archives of the Leningrad Pedagogical Institute. Stenography, 50 pp.

“当代心理学方向”。1932 年 6 月 26 日致共产主义科学院的报告。载于L.S. 维果茨基的《高级心理功能的发展》 ，第 458-481 页。莫斯科：俄罗斯联邦教育科学院，1960 年。

1933

1933

In Mental Development of Children during Education by L. S. Vygotsky, pp. 33–52. Moscow-Leningrad: Government Publishing House, 1935.

“Play and Its Role in the Psychological Development of the Child.” Lecture, Leningrad Pedagogical Institute, 1933. Problems of Psychology , 1966, no. 6, pp. 62–76.

“Problems of Development.” Lecture, Leningrad Pedagogical Institute, Nov. 27, 1933. Archives of the Leningrad Pedagogical Institute. Stenography, 17 pp.

“The Problem of Consciousness.” Report after the speech of A. R. Luria on Dec. 5 and 9, 1933. In Psychology of Grammar , pp. 178–196. Moscow: Moscow State University, 1968.

“学龄期间常识和科学思想的发展”。列宁格勒教育学院科学会议报告，1933 年 5 月 20 日。《教育期间儿童的智力发展》 ，第 96-115 页。莫斯科-列宁格勒：Uchpedgiz，1935 年。

“Development of Common Sense and Scientific Ideas during School Age.” Report to the Scientific Conference, Leningrad Pedagogical Institute, May 20, 1933. In Mental Development of Children during Education , pp. 96–115. Moscow-Leningrad: Uchpedgiz, 1935.

“情绪研究”。LS Vygotsky 私人档案，1933 年。手稿。555 页。另见“从当代心理神经学角度研究情绪”。《哲学问题》 ，1970 年，第 6 期，第 110-130 页。另请参阅“20 世纪初外国心理学对情绪本质理解的两个方向”。《心理学问题》 ，1968 年，第 2 期，第 149-156 页。

“Study of Emotions.” Private archives of L. S. Vygotsky, 1933. Manuscript. 555 pp. Also “The Study of Emotions in the Light of Contemporary Psychoneurology.” Questions of Philosophy , 1970, no. 6, pp. 110–130. See also, “Two Directions in the Comprehension of the Nature of Emotions in Foreign Psychology in the beginning of the Twentieth Century.” Problems of Psychology , 1968, no. 2, pp. 149–156.

“高级心理功能的发展与破坏问题”。LS Vygotsky 著《高级心理功能的发展》 第 364-383 页。莫斯科：俄罗斯联邦教育科学院，1960 年。（维果茨基的最后一份报告，在他去世前一个月准备。）

“Problem of Development and Destruction of the Higher Psychological Functions.” In Development of Higher Psychological Functions by L. S. Vygotsky, pp. 364–383. Moscow: Academy of Pedagogical Sciences, RSFSR, 1960. (Vygotsky’s last report, prepared one month before his death.)

“心理学和本地化教学”。《乌克兰第一届神经病理学家和精神病学家会议报告 》，第 34-41 页。哈尔科夫，1934 年。

Fascism in Psychoneurology . Moscow-Leningrad: Biomedgiz, 1934. (With V. A. Giljarovsky et al.)

Works of Various Years

用英语

IN ENGLISH

“俄罗斯聋哑儿童社会教育原则”。《国际聋人教育会议 》，第 227-237 页。伦敦，1925 年。

“The Principles of Social Education of Deaf and Dumb Children in Russia.” In International Conference on the Education of the Deaf , pp. 227–237. London, 1925.

“儿童文化发展问题”。《遗传心理学杂志》 ，1929 年，第 36 卷，第 415-434 页。

“The Problem of the Cultural Development of the Child.” Journal of Genetic Psychology , 1929, vol. 36, pp. 415–434.

“精神分裂症中的思维”。《神经精神病学档案》 ，1934 年，第 31 卷。

“Thought in Schizophrenia.” Archives of Neurological Psychiatry , 1934, vol. 31.

“思想与言语。” 《精神病学》 ，1939 年，第 2 卷，第 29-54 页。转载自 S. Saporta 主编的《心理语言学：一本阅读书 》，第 509-537 页。纽约：Holt、Rinehart 和 Winston，1961 年。

“Thought and Speech.” Psychiatry , 1939, vol. 2, pp. 29–54. Rpt. in S. Saporta, ed., Psycholinguistics: A Book of Readings , pp. 509–537. New York: Holt, Rinehart and Winston, 1961.

《思想与语言》 。剑桥：麻省理工学院出版社和威利出版社，1962 年。（最初于 1934 年以俄文出版。）

Thought and Language . Cambridge: MIT Press and Wiley, 1962. (Originally published in Russian in 1934.)

“心理学与功能定位。” 《神经心理学》 ，1965 年，第 3 卷，第 381-386 页。（最初于 1934 年以俄文出版。）

“Psychology and Localization of Functions.” Neuropsychologia , 1965, vol. 3, pp. 381–386. (Originally published in Russian in 1934.)

“高级心理功能的发展”。载于 A. Leontiev、A. Luria 和 A. Smirnov 编的《苏联心理学研究》 ，第 1 卷，第 11-46 页。Progress Publishing，1966 年。（节选版）

“Development of the Higher Mental Functions.” In A. Leontiev, A. Luria, and A. Smirnov, eds., Psychological Research in the USSR , vol. I, pp. 11–46. Progress Publishing, 1966. (Abridged.)

“游戏及其在儿童心理发展中的作用。” 《苏联心理学》 ，1967 年，第 3 卷。（维果茨基纪念特刊。包括 JS Bruner 的序言以及苏联心理学家 Luria、Davydov、El'konin、Gal'perin 和 Zaporozhetz 的文章。文章基于 1933 年的演讲。）

“Play and Its Role in the Mental Development of the Child.” Soviet Psychology , 1967, vol. 3. (Vygotsky memorial issue. Includes preface by J. S. Bruner and articles by Soviet psychologists Luria, Davydov, El’konin, Gal’perin, and Zaporozhetz. Article based on 1933 lecture.)

《艺术心理学》 。剑桥：麻省理工学院出版社，1971 年。（数十年来文学和艺术批评的文集。）

The Psychology of Art . Cambridge: MIT Press, 1971. (Collected writings of literary and art criticism spanning several decades.)

“从当代心理神经学看斯宾诺莎的情绪理论。” 《苏联哲学研究》 ，1972 年，第 10 卷，第 362-382 页。

“Spinoza’s Theory of the Emotions in Light of Contemporary Psychoneurology.” Soviet Studies in Philosophy , 1972, vol. 10, pp. 362–382.
